title: Holistic Agent Leaderboard: The Missing Infrastructure for AI Agent Evaluation
description:

title: Do Large Language Models Respect Contracts? Evaluating and Enforcing Contract-Adherence in Code Generation
description:

description:

title: ToPolyAgent: AI Agents for Coarse-Grained Topological Polymer Simulations
description:
arXiv:2510.12091v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: We introduce ToPolyAgent, a multi-agent AI framework for performing coarse-grained molecular dynamics (MD) simulations of topological polymers through natural language instructions. By integrating large language models (LLMs) with domain-specific comp

title: MatSciBench: Benchmarking the Reasoning Ability of Large Language Models in Materials Science
description:
arXiv:2510.12171v1 Announce Type: new

title: Model Behavior: The Science of AI Style
description: Why does ChatGPT sound the way it does? Go behind the scenes to see how the style a model emerges, the trade-offs researchers weigh, and what the future of tone and voice in human-AI interaction could look like.
